detailedViolations.description: Img element missing an alt attribute. Use the alt attribute to specify a short text alternative.
detailedViolations.help: Images must have appropriate alternative text.

nodes.failureSummary: Fix: Add meaningful alt text to images, or use alt="" for decorative images.

detailedViolations.description: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level.
detailedViolations.help: Text must have sufficient color contrast.

nodes.failureSummary: Fix: Increase color contrast to meet WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text).

details.message: Pa11y test completed (fallback mode: Command failed: npx pa11y "https://example.com" --reporter json --standard WCAG2AA --timeout 30000)
